Info.Title: Belyy tigr
Info.Writer: Aleksandr Borodyanskiy (screenplay), Ilya Boyashov (novel), Karen Shakhnazarov (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Aleksey Vertkov, Vitaliy Kishchenko, Valeriy Grishko, Dmitriy Bykovskiy-Romashov
Info.Plot: Great Patriotic War, early 1940s. After barely surviving a battle with a mysterious, ghostly-white Tiger tank, Red Army Sergeant Ivan Naydenov becomes obsessed with its destruction.
